# <a name="create-an-email-signature"></a><span data-ttu-id="6297e-102">Kurti el. pašto parašą</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6297e-102">Create an email signature</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="6297e-103">eiti į</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6297e-103">Go to</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="6297e-104">**Parametrai** > **Peržiūrėti visus "Outlook" parametrai** > **rašyti ir atsakyti**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6297e-104">**Settings** > **View all Outlook settings** > **Compose and reply**.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="6297e-105">**El. pašto parašas**, įveskite savo parašą ir naudoti formatavimo parinktis keisti savo išvaizdą.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6297e-105">Under **Email signature**, type your signature and use the available formatting options to change its appearance.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6297e-106">*Pastaba:* Jūs galite turėti tik vieną parašas kiekvienam abonementui.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6297e-106">*Note:* You can have only one signature per account.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6297e-107">Norėdami sužinoti daugiau, žiūrėkite [kurti ir įtraukti el. laiško parašą programos "Outlook" žiniatinklio](https://support.office.com/article/5ff9dcfd-d3f1-447b-b2e9-39f91b074ea3).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6297e-107">To learn more, see [Create and add an email signature in Outlook on the web](https://support.office.com/article/5ff9dcfd-d3f1-447b-b2e9-39f91b074ea3).</span></span>
